Description:
Working with a team of developers and communicating with them to form a product roadmap to achieve goals.
Troubleshooting and fixing common bugs and errors during the testing and production activities of the company product.
Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
Contributing to the organization's growth curve by delivering projects per the schedule and with high efficiency.
Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software.
Create security and data protection settings.Skills
Skills:
A passionate individual with a minimum undergraduate degree in courses like Computer Science, IT, or Software Development.
Hands on experience with relational databases (MS SQL Server) and exposure to no-SQL data stores.
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
A keen eye for detail-oriented programming using concepts of languages and different frameworks like React and Node.js.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Thorough understanding of all front-end computing tools and software to develop required client projects.
